CustomField.description: This field is used to display Location from associated Installed Product or Product Stock of associated Stocked Serial.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( SM_Installed_Product__c ) ) , SM_Installed_Product__r.Site__r.Name , IF(NOT( ISBLANK( SM_Stocked_Serial__c ) ), SM_Stocked_Serial__r.Product_Stock__r.Location__r.Name , '') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to display Location from associated Installed Product or Product Stock of associated Stocked Serial.
CustomField.label: Location
